original_title: FLOSS Weekly Episode 856: QT: Fix It Please, My Mom is Calling
original_content:
This week Jonathan chats with Maurice Kalinowski about QT! Thats the framework that runs just about anywhere, making it easy to write cross-platform applications. Whats the connection with KDE? And how has this turned into a successful company? Watch to find out!


https://www.qt.io/


Did you know you can watch the live recording of the show right on our YouTube Channel? Have someone youd like us to interview? Let us know, or have the guest contact us! Take a look at the schedule here.

Direct Download in DRM-free MP3.
If youd rather read along, heres the transcript for this weeks episode.
Places to follow the FLOSS Weekly Podcast:

title: - QTフレームワークの魅力とは？クロスプラットフォームアプリケーション開発の可能性
body: 今週のポッドキャストではQTについて対談。クロスプラットフォームアプリ作成の便利さとKDEとの関係を紹介。
titles: - QTフレームワークの魅力とは？クロスプラットフォームアプリケーション開発の可能性
- KDEとの関係性を探る：QTが生んだ成功企業の秘密
- Maurice Kalinowskiとの対談：QTの革新性とその実績
- FLOSS Weekly PodcastでのQT特集：最新情報と配信スケジュール
- YouTubeでの生放送視聴：電子工作の最前線に迫る！
